I think the US look at the British as a race that tells it how it is, and if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell ." He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop.
